name: mulcanad
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, cmul, c0), co(c2, cmul, c1)))

stmt.origin: mpbid(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cmul, c0), co(c2, cmul, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, cmul, c0), co(c2, cmul, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c2, cmul, c0), co(c2, cmul, c1)), wceq(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, cmul, c0), co(c2, cmul, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c2, cmul, c0), co(c2, cmul, c1)), wceq(c0, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c2, cmul, c0), co(c2, cmul, c1)), wceq(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c2, nat0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, cmul, c0), co(c2, cmul, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c2, nat0))

comment: Cancellation of a nonzero factor on the left in an equation. One-way deduction form of ~ mulcand . (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
